title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tai Lang: Zhi Kaixin Chuang Long Nian
synopsis: It is said that there is a thousands years old treasure that must be found before it fall into the wrong hands, and the Dragon flute which only the real descendant of the dragon can open the door of the treasure. It's a race against time and full onslaught of enemies to stop the heroes from there quest. (Source: AniDB)
